explanation: [0-0] This is an animated scene, a boy with blue clothes and brown hair is standing behind a purple sofa, holding a red laser pointer in his hand. Behind him is a gray shutter door, and next to the shutter door is a rolled-up red curtain.

[0-7] A red robot wolf passes by the camera, and the brown-haired boy points the laser pointer at it. At this time, the shutter door opens, and a robot appears next to the boy. It has a round head, a yellow body, a hat on its head, and the letter "i" on its chest. Then it takes out a photo, and the brown-haired boy looks back at it.
